def_cn: （使用多种语言的地区里）讲英语的
def_en: Anglophone communities are English-speaking communities in areas where more than one language is commonly spoken.

def_cn: （指母语为英语或因所在国的官方语言为英语而）讲英语的人
def_en: Anglophones are people whose native language is English or who speak English because they live in a country where English is one of the official languages.
